mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account_id AS "accountId", a.openid AS "openid", a.subscribestatus AS "subscribestatus", a.subscribetime AS "subscribetime", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.picpath AS "picpath", a.gender AS "gender", a.language AS "language", a.country AS "country", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.headimgurl AS "headimgurl", a.wxid AS "wxid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "accountName"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_fans( id, account_id, openid, subscribestatus, subscribetime, nickname, picpath, gender, language, country, province, city, headimgurl, wxid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{accountId}, #{openid}, #{subscribestatus}, #{subscribetime}, #{nickname}, #{picpath}, #{gender}, #{language}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{headimgurl}, #{wxid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
